issues.description: The template PersonService declares a PersonRepository field but does not provide any injection (no constructor or @Autowired), while the solution implements a constructor-based injection. The problem statement expects students to implement methods in PersonService that call personRepository (e.g., save, addParent). As provided, the template's personRepository will be null at runtime (or not injected), causing NullPointerExceptions or failing to run tests. This is a structural issue because students cannot execute or correctly test the intended functionality without first adding dependency injection wiring — an implementation detail that should not be required for the task as described.
